languages.text: {n}Женщина одаривает проктора яростной улыбкой.{/n} "Ну разумеется я приложу все силы, делая то, в чем меня одарил Великий — буду приумножать богатства Вольного Торговца! Разве не это угодно Ему?"

{n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина одаривает проктора яростной улыбкой.{/n} "Ну разумеется я приложу все силы, делая то, в чем меня одарил Великий — буду приумножать богатства Вольного Торговца! Разве не это угодно Ему?"

{n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

languages.text: {n}婕伊气极反笑。{/n}“是啊，当然了！只要是至高无上的神皇命令我做的事情，我肯定会好好做！帮忙扩充行商浪人的国库，肯定会令神皇非常满意，你不觉得吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊气极反笑。{/n}“是啊，当然了！只要是至高无上的神皇命令我做的事情，我肯定会好好做！帮忙扩充行商浪人的国库，肯定会令神皇非常满意，你不觉得吗？”

languages.text: {n}Jae le responde con una sonrisa furiosa.{/n} «Por supuesto, haré todo lo que esté en mi mano para cumplir la función para la que me ha bendecido el Exaltado: ¡aumentar la riqueza de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! Eso Le complacerá, ¿no cree?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae le responde con una sonrisa furiosa.{/n} «Por supuesto, haré todo lo que esté en mi mano para cumplir la función para la que me ha bendecido el Exaltado: ¡aumentar la riqueza de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! Eso Le complacerá, ¿no cree?».

languages.text: {n}Jae lui adresse un sourire carnassier.{/n} -« Mais bien entendu, je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour enrichir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car après tout, c'est à ça que doit servir le don que je tiens de l'Exalté ! Cela devrait beaucoup Lui plaire, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lui adresse un sourire carnassier.{/n} -« Mais bien entendu, je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour enrichir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car après tout, c'est à ça que doit servir le don que je tiens de l'Exalté ! Cela devrait beaucoup Lui plaire, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}ジェイは挑発的な笑みを浮かべて彼に応じた。{/n}「もちろんよ。エグザルテッド・ワンがアタシに授けてくださった最も得意なこと、ローグトレーダーの富を増やすことに全力を尽くすわ！陛下もきっと喜ぶと思わない？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは挑発的な笑みを浮かべて彼に応じた。{/n}「もちろんよ。エグザルテッド・ワンがアタシに授けてくださった最も得意なこと、ローグトレーダーの富を増やすことに全力を尽くすわ！陛下もきっと喜ぶと思わない？」

languages.text: {n}Jae onu öfkeli bir gülümsemeyle kutsuyor.{/n} "Tabii canım. Görkemli'nin en iyi şekilde yapmam için beni kutsadığı şeyi yapacak ve Hür Tacir'in zenginliğini artıracağım! Bu O'nu memnun etmez mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, onu öfkeli bir gülümsemeyle kutsuyor.{/n} "Ah, tabii. Görkemli'nin en iyi şekilde yapmam için beni kutsadığı şeyi yapacağım ve Hür Tacir'in zenginliğini artıracağım! Bu O'nu memnun etmez mi?"

languages.text: {n}Jae schenkt ihm ein wütendes Lächeln.{/n} "Aber natürlich werde ich alles in meiner Macht Stehende tun, um die Fähigkeit einzusetzen, mit der mich der Erhabene gesegnet hat – den Wohlstand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu erhöhen! Das würde Ihm doch gefallen, meint Ihr nicht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae graces him with a furious smile.{/n} "Why, of course, I will do everything in my power to do what the Exalted One has blessed me to do best — increase the Rogue Trader's wealth! Would that not please Him, you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schenkt ihm ein wütendes Lächeln.{/n} "Aber natürlich werde ich alles in meiner Macht Stehende tun, um die Fähigkeit einzusetzen, mit der mich der Erhabene gesegnet hat – den Wohlstand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu erhöhen! Das würde Ihm doch gefallen, meint Ihr nicht?"
